thread.section_title: Strawberrynet.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Strawberrynet.com | www.strawberrynet.com | 3 of 507
thread.title: LizM

author: LizM
title: LizM
text: I've been buying skincare off this site for several years (and have attained their 10% off loyalty discount.) StrawbNet offers a wide range, the prices are mostly competitive and I have never had any problems with my orders. (However if you are particular about ingredients, it pays to check all the product details on the brands' own websites.) Brands and product ranges vary all the time according to their supply chain. Buyer reviews which are mostly helpful. Good bargain prices on some items e.g. approaching expiry date or unboxed or simply less popular. Lacks a "wish list" feature. Speedy international delivery.
